languages.text: Но твердая рука и меткий глаз не изменили Вольному Торговцу — точными выстрелами он{mf||а} прогнал{mf||а} жуткого недруга. Поле битвы осталось за династией фон Валанциус.

But the Rogue Trader's steady hand and keen eye do not betray {mf|him|her} at this crucial moment — {mf|he|she} drives away the malevolent foe with high-precision shots. The von Valancius dynasty has emerged victorious from this skirmish.
languages.original_text: Но твердая рука и меткий глаз не изменили Вольному Торговцу — точными выстрелами он{mf||а} прогнал{mf||а} жуткого недруга. Поле битвы осталось за династией фон Валанциус.

traits.locale_text: But the Rogue Trader's steady hand and keen eye do not betray {mf|him|her} at this crucial moment — {mf|he|she} drives away the malevolent foe with high-precision shots. The von Valancius dynasty has emerged victorious from this skirmish.

But the Rogue Trader's steady hand and keen eye do not betray {mf|him|her} at this crucial moment — {mf|he|she} drives away the malevolent foe with high-precision shots. The von Valancius dynasty has emerged victorious from this skirmish.

But the Rogue Trader's steady hand and keen eye do not betray {mf|him|her} at this crucial moment — {mf|he|she} drives away the malevolent foe with high-precision shots. The von Valancius dynasty has emerged victorious from this skirmish.

languages.text: 然而在这关键时刻，行商浪人出色的身手立了大功。{mf|他|她}一枪击中敌人要害，将敌人赶跑了。冯·瓦兰修斯王朝在这场小规模遭遇战中获得了胜利。
languages.original_text: But the Rogue Trader's steady hand and keen eye do not betray {mf|him|her} at this crucial moment — {mf|he|she} drives away the malevolent foe with high-precision shots. The von Valancius dynasty has emerged victorious from this skirmish.

traits.locale_text: 然而在这关键时刻，行商浪人出色的身手立了大功。{mf|他|她}一枪击中敌人要害，将敌人赶跑了。冯·瓦兰修斯王朝在这场小规模遭遇战中获得了胜利。

languages.text: それでも自由開拓者の統率力と鋭い観察眼は、こんな危機的状況でも弱みを見せることはない。正確な射撃で邪悪な敵を追い払ってみせる。フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝はこの小衝突で勝利をおさめた。
languages.original_text: But the Rogue Trader's steady hand and keen eye do not betray {mf|him|her} at this crucial moment — {mf|he|she} drives away the malevolent foe with high-precision shots. The von Valancius dynasty has emerged victorious from this skirmish.

traits.locale_text: それでも自由開拓者の統率力と鋭い観察眼は、こんな危機的状況でも弱みを見せることはない。正確な射撃で邪悪な敵を追い払ってみせる。フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝はこの小衝突で勝利をおさめた。

languages.text: Pero la mano firme y el ojo avizor {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente no le juegan una mala pasada en este momento crucial, sino que consigue disparar con precisión al zafio enemigo hasta ahuyentarlo. La dinastía von Valancius ha salido victoriosa de esta escaramuza.
languages.original_text: But the Rogue Trader's steady hand and keen eye do not betray {mf|him|her} at this crucial moment — {mf|he|she} drives away the malevolent foe with high-precision shots. The von Valancius dynasty has emerged victorious from this skirmish.

traits.locale_text: Pero la mano firme y el ojo avizor {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente no le juegan una mala pasada en este momento crucial, sino que consigue disparar con precisión al zafio enemigo hasta ahuyentarlo. La dinastía von Valancius ha salido victoriosa de esta escaramuza.

languages.text: Mais le sang-froid et l'œil perçant {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} ne {mf|le|la} trahissent pas à cet instant fatidique et {mf|il|elle} repousse l'adversaire en le criblant de tirs d'une précision extrême. La dynastie von Valancius est sortie victorieuse de cette escarmouche.
languages.original_text: But the Rogue Trader's steady hand and keen eye do not betray {mf|him|her} at this crucial moment — {mf|he|she} drives away the malevolent foe with high-precision shots. The von Valancius dynasty has emerged victorious from this skirmish.

traits.locale_text: Mais le sang-froid et l'œil perçant {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} ne {mf|le|la} trahissent pas à cet instant fatidique et {mf|il|elle} repousse l'adversaire en le criblant de tirs d'une précision extrême. La dynastie von Valancius est sortie victorieuse de cette escarmouche.

languages.text: Aber die ruhige Hand und das scharfe Auge {mf|des Freihändlers lassen ihn|der Freihändlerin lassen sie} in diesem entscheidenden Moment nicht im Stich – mit präzisen Schüssen vertreibt {mf|er|sie} den bösartigen Gegner. Die Dynastie von Valancius ist aus diesem Gefecht siegreich hervorgegangen.
languages.original_text: But the Rogue Trader's steady hand and keen eye do not betray {mf|him|her} at this crucial moment — {mf|he|she} drives away the malevolent foe with high-precision shots. The von Valancius dynasty has emerged victorious from this skirmish.

traits.locale_text: Aber die ruhige Hand und das scharfe Auge {mf|des Freihändlers lassen ihn|der Freihändlerin lassen sie} in diesem entscheidenden Moment nicht im Stich – mit präzisen Schüssen vertreibt {mf|er|sie} den bösartigen Gegner. Die Dynastie von Valancius ist aus diesem Gefecht siegreich hervorgegangen.

languages.text: Fakat Hür Tacir'in şaşmaz eli ve keskin gözü, ona bu hayati anda ihanet etmiyor. Hassas vuruşlarıyla kötücül düşmanı uzaklaştırıyor. Von Valancius hanedanlığı, bu çatışmadan galip ayrılıyor.
languages.original_text: But the Rogue Trader's steady hand and keen eye do not betray {mf|him|her} at this crucial moment — {mf|he|she} drives away the malevolent foe with high-precision shots. The von Valancius dynasty has emerged victorious from this skirmish.

traits.locale_text: Fakat Hür Tacir'in şaşmaz eli ve keskin gözü, ona bu hayati anda ihanet etmedi. Hassas vuruşlarıyla kötücül düşmanı uzaklaştırdı. Von Valancius hanedanlığı, bu çatışmadan galip ayrıldı.
